content.text: I'm good thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! It sounds like you have a lot going on. What are you working on right now?
I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love. It's a lot of work, but it's worth it!
That's awesome! I wish you the best of luck with your restaurant. And I'm glad to hear that you're happy in your new relationship.
Thank you! I'm really excited about it.
What are you looking forward to the most about your restaurant?
I'm looking forward to creating a space where people can come together and enjoy good food and good company. I also want to use my restaurant to give back to the community.
That's great! I think that's a really noble goal. I'm sure your restaurant will be a success.
What kind of food will you be serving at your restaurant?
I'm still working on the menu, but I'm thinking of serving a variety of comfort foods. I want people to feel like they're coming home when they eat at my restaurant.
That sounds delicious! I'm sure your restaurant will be a hit.
